short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tools for Illyriad. Cweissha, Eradz, & BAZOON

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DS Sidekick is a chrome extension that assists the with game Illyriad. It is intended to suplement the existing DS Companion and replace the popular IllyTools plugin. It is only available to members of the Dominion and its allies.
